quote: Offstage, I couldn't put things into words, and that was the one thing I'd always been able to rely on. Putting my feelings into words and praying they wouldn't be able to get out again.
quote_letters: OFFSTAGE I COULDNT PUT THINGS INTO WORDS AND THAT WAS THE ONE THING ID ALWAYS BEEN ABLE TO RELY ON PUTTING MY FEELINGS INTO WORDS AND PRAYING THEY WOULDNT BE ABLE TO GET OUT AGAIN
